org.cloudbus.cloudsim.storage.models.harddrives

Class StorageModelHdd

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.storage.models.harddrives.StorageModelHdd
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StorageModelHddSeagateDesktopST4000DM000, StorageModelHddSeagateEnterpriseST6000VN0001

    public abstract class StorageModelHdd
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class of a specific hard drive model. Note: new HDD characteristics can be implemented.
    Author:
    Baptiste Louis
